{{Description|The submerged wreckage of a once-proud ship. Countless mysterious creatures now dwell within what should have been the vessel's silent final resting place.<br>If you can eliminate the monsters within, you will be granted access to materials that can enlighten you as to the nature of talents and their advancement.}}
'''Pale Forgotten Glory''' is a [[Domain]] located north-east of [[Poisson]], underwater in [[Fontaine]]. Clearing this domain gives [[Character Talent Material]]s. Challenge domains with higher levels to get better rewards.

==Ley Line Disorder==
Each level in this domain has the following Ley Line Disorder, respectively:
{| class="wikitable align-center"
!Level
!Ley Line Disorder
|-
!I-IV
|When a character recovers or loses HP, your active character's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG increases by 10% for 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 7 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently. This effect will be canceled when the character leaves the field.
|}

==Challenge Features==
Each level in this domain has the following Challenge Features:
{| class="wikitable"
!Level
!Challenge Features
|-
!III–IV
|<li>When a character's current HP increases or decreases, your active character's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will deal increased DMG. As such, place characters with Healing abilities in the party to defeat your opponents more effectively.</li>
|}
